verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I lift my eyes up unto the mountains Where does my help come from? My help comes from You, Maker of Heaven, Creator of the Earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, how I need You, Lord, You are my only hope, You are my only prayer (You are my only prayer so Iâ€™ll wait) So I will wait for You to come and rescue me. Come and give me life, come and give me life.{/lang-eng}
